ant.description: Ants are small insects that live in large groups called a colony
ant.fact: Some ants are able to carry twenty times their own weight

bee.description: Bees are flying insects that collect pollen from flowers

butterfly.description: Butterflies are a flying insect that lives off of flowering plants
butterfly.fact: Butterflies can taste things with their feet

caterpillar.description: Caterpillars are insects with long bodies and multiple legs

cricket.description: Crickets are insects with flattened bodies, long antennae, and powerful back legs
cricket.fact: Crickets are know for their distinctive "chirping" sound

ladybug.description: Ladybugs are small round beetles with red shells and black spots
ladybug.fact: Lady bugs are also known as ladybirds or lady beetles
